meanings.definition: Relating to the making of maps.
meanings.sent1: The cartographical skills of the explorer helped in charting new territories.
meanings.sent2: The cartographical details on the map were precise and clear.
meanings.sent3: The cartographical puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cartographical wonderland, mapping out ideas and connections.
meanings.sent5: The cartographical journey through the forest was filled with twists and turns.

meanings.definition: Involving the creation or study of maps.
meanings.sent1: The cartographical expedition aimed to uncover ancient map secrets.
meanings.sent2: The cartographical department at the university was well-equipped.
meanings.sent3: The cartographical mix-up led to a hilarious treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a cartographical maze, trying to navigate through memories.
meanings.sent5: The cartographical exploration of the city revealed hidden gems.
